Reviews.Title: “"Angels in Paris"”
Reviews.Author: lesliebouchard
Reviews.Content: husband decided paris booked trip december 2009 2010 booked class treat picked hotel reviews location left canada excited paris arrived hotel told agency booked package cancelled hotel reservations hotel called received cancellation told 1st class airline tickets france hotel anyway sleep arriving 930 am saturday paris absolutely agency canada 6 hours staff hotel locked baggage offered breakfast sit lounge sorry cant leave didnt waited agency canada told glitch computer system cancelling hotel try 4 star hotel paris waited waited waited couldnt rebook hotel couldnt else 8 oclock night sitting lounge hotel agency hadnt eaten didnt miss telephone call agency time exhausted started cry luckily staff contacted hotel manager golden tulip opera de noailles saturday tried console night maybe try monday hugged told worry meantime agency called hotel speak husband finally found 4 star hotel paris 3 nights cab compare apples apples 4 star hotel dump mean dump nearby eat top told husband mind bar drink trying relax sipping beer 1100pm paris running floor mouse rat call told worker shrugged tried sleep clothes top bed dirty course sleep alluded morning decided hotel golden tulip opera de noailles maybe lucky able sleep sunday staying hotel regardless luckily fit 9 days trip told 2 days booked probably move told manager tomorrow try care relieved dream clean marble bathroom decorated garden middle building looked windows showering husband passed 800 pm day heard sound sleeping afternoon monday manager assistant breakfast hugged told arranged agency able 12 days stay angels seen service beyond call duty people hotel top 1 week stay realized manager staff upgraded original standard deluxe telling doing time guests hotel staff called restaurants reservations management suggested looking booked sight seeing tours cleaning ladies waiters desk clerks polite helpful truly special trip wonderful experience paris adult daughter definately staying tulip opera de noailles 4 star compared 4 star hotels paris 20 star hotel sincerely leslie
